youtube.title: The Truth About Eyelash Bugs: Removing Demodex Mites
youtube.description: Discover the reality of Demodex mites, commonly known as eyelash bugs. This video shows the process of cleaning and removing buildup from the lash line to maintain ocular health and prevent irritation. Learn why eye hygiene is crucial for everyone.
